this_title: We Know a Better Word than Happy
introduction: We know a better word than happy captures children's delight in the possibilities for fun and learning in an urban green space established by community activism in Maryhill, Glasgow.A quarter of households in this area have no access to a private or shared garden. Shot on 35mm colour film, following lockdown: the children express their rights to outdoor play, for learning, togetherness and resilience.
